meanings.definition: The quality or state of being radiant.
meanings.sent1: The radiancy of the sun's rays brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: Her smile added a touch of radiancy to the gloomy day.
meanings.sent3: The radiancy of the disco ball made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent4: The radiancy of her personality shone through in everything she did.
meanings.sent5: The radiancy of the stars in the night sky was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: The amount of radiant energy emitted by a source.
meanings.sent1: The radiancy of the light bulb determined its brightness.
meanings.sent2: The radiancy of the fire warmed the entire room.
meanings.sent3: The radiancy of the campfire made the marshmallows roast perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The radiancy of the sun provided energy for the plants to grow.
meanings.sent5: The radiancy of the flashlight guided us through the dark cave.
